abstract: Mexican security forces track Joaquin Guzman Loera, drug boss who escaped maximum security jail in July, to hideout in Golden Triangle area in Guzman’s home state Sinaloa, but fail to capture him; surveillance video from Guzman’s cell recorded on escape night reveals evidence of prison’s ineptitude.
lead_paragraph: Security forces hunting for the escaped drug kingpin Joaquín Guzmán Loera tracked him to a hide-out in Mexico’s remote northwestern mountains, but he fled as they approached, injuring his leg and his face, Mexican officials said late Friday.

headline.print_headline: Escaped Drug Kingpin Eludes Security Forces at Hideout, Mexican Officials Say
headline.main: ‘El Chapo’ Fled as Security Forces Closed In, Mexico Officials Say
